extendedInfo.description: If you have issues with the theme, please email our support! There are issues with GO Apps and Jelly Bean devices. This is out of our control; we will need to send you the themes.This theme requires:â GO SMS (http://bit.ly/tHqrr4)GOES WELL WITHiPhone GO Keyboard Skin: http://bit.ly/K2NuWLiPhone TouchPal Skin: http://bit.ly/QbitH3Check out:* iPhone GO SMS: http://bit.ly/KX4wVM* Pink iPhone GO SMS: http://bit.ly/JCvkMDFEATURESâº As accurate as possible, even includes the signature rounded look in conversation list! When paired with iPhone GO Keyboard or TouchPal keyboard above, chat will also appear rounded!âº Send button!âº Glossy, i-inspired iconsâº Two optional custom fonts (Siri Bold used in screenshots - iFont Normal used for SMS Date)âº New Theme Hub with ability to apply theme directly!INSTALL1. Hit open above, and select "Apply Theme"Activate the font1. Go into GO SMS settings, Appearance and Scan for Fonts.2. Once finished, select the font "iFont [GO SMS iMessage Theme]" or "SiriFont [GO SMS iMessage Theme]" within the customization for Conversation List, Conversation and PopUp, and save.Enjoy!SUPPORTIf you have any questions or wish to make a request, refer to our contact address or social addresses below! You can also get in touch with us through:â Twitter (@aBbtdesigns): http://bit.ly/xqfEl1â Facebook (aBbtdesigns): http://on.fb.me/yO5ULmKeywords: ilike, mac, apple, widget, gloss, shine, glamour
